short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LarePass uses the Olares system to securely store your login details, sync them across devices, and manage your Olares devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LarePass Chrome Extension: Your Gateway to Olares

The LarePass Chrome Extension is your seamless connection to Olares, a cutting-edge, open-source, self-hosted solution that transforms personal edge devices into private, sovereign clouds.   
With the LarePass Chrome Extension, you can extend Olares’ powerful functionalities directly to your browser, enabling secure, efficient, and private interactions online. 

Key Features:
        •        Multi-Account Management: Effortlessly manage multiple accounts from a single interface.
        •        View Resource Consumption: Monitor system performance and resource usage in real time.
        •        VPN Management: Easily connect, configure, and manage VPNs for secure browsing.
        •        Web Content Collection: Save web content directly to Olares.
        •        Password Management: Generate, share, and autofill strong passwords and passkeys securely.
        •        One-Time Authentication: Manage and streamline one-time authentication codes.
        •        Cookie Synchronization: Sync browser cookies with Olares for a unified and seamless experience.
